website_summaries.verdict: Yankee Candle’s jar candles easily stand above the competition due to their irresistible scents and exceptional quality.
pros: An immense range of great scents available
Relaxing lemon citrus and lavender fragrance combination is our pick, but there are hundreds of others
Premium clean burning wax and wick
cons: The best jar candle available is also a bit expensive

customer_reviews.title: It lasts a long time and has a strong scent
customer_reviews.text: This smell is addictive! I have it in spray form, jelly jar, and I just ordered car fresheners! The candle (when lit of course) is very strong, in a good way! My room instantly smells like lavender lemon. Also, the candle burns for a reallllllly long time. I’ve definitely burned it for over 90 hours, and it still has a ways to go before it’s finished. I probably have another 15+ hours left, which is why I just repurchased another candle! I usually don’t ever spend $20 on candles- but with Yankee Candle Lemon Lavender I’ll make an exception. It’s a really clean, fresh, yummy smell. Intoxicating, and appropriate for any time of the year.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my best friend for her birthday and it smells amazing!!!! DONT LET THE CILANTRO PART SCARE YOU OFF I wish i would have got 2 because now Im ordering 1 for myself and have to wait 2 days to burn it.
customer_reviews.author: Bree W

customer_reviews.title: Beware!
customer_reviews.text: This candle hardly smells like Macintosh apples. It is very offensive, smells cheap and gave me a headache. I don't really think that it's a Yankee Candle at all, appears like a knockoff with Yankee Candle label just plastered onto it. This is not what I'm used to. I won't be buying this again
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Strong, true scent and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The scent from this is incredible and lasts the whole jar. Definitely a strong sweet and fruity scent, and being in the middle of an Australian summer where I’m picking and eating fresh raspberries I can tell you this Red Raspberry scent is completely on point! I have two indoor cats and dogs, and yet 5 minutes of this candle, guests are inhaling deeply and complimenting how delicious the house smells. I would suggest buying 3 different scents though as it’s easy to get used to one and therefore not feel it is as effective. Alternating will mean you always have a beautifully fragrant home.
customer_reviews.author: BGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great scent, candle arrived melted...
customer_reviews.text: I love the Lemon Lavender scent, but am really disappointed with how it arrived (see photo). At some point, I guess the candle melted and altered the original state of it, to the point of completely covering the wick. I had to place the jar in a pot of boiling water to melt the wax, then dig for the wick and pull it out. Otherwise, I wouldn’t have been able to use it. All in all, it’s a great scent, sold at a great price, just know that this is something you might have to do, as well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: *Notes Included* Best Macintosh on the Market?
customer_reviews.text: *Notes include* Top Notes: Apple Peels, Crisp Greens Mid Notes: Rindy Grapefruit, Juicy Macintosh Base Notes: Clove Bud, Sheer Musk The best apple candle on the market! Well used to be before it lost some of it's throw. Goose Creeks Macintosh is better mostly due to it's throw. I still like this candle enough to give it a 5 though. Village Candle make a version which is not as good but is cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Candle Harlot

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love Yankee Candle ?
customer_reviews.text: As always Yankee Candle provides you with a great product. What I love about their fragrances is the no chemical or overly contrived false smell. I use this fragrance in open houses and always get compliments on how great the house smells. Long lasting, burns evenly. I know they’re pricey but compare your burn hours. Smells wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee Burger

customer_reviews.title: 2 wicks means double the scent release!
customer_reviews.text: I already knew that I loved this scent when I made this purchase. They were such a good price that I just had to get them. This is one of the few scents that I can tolerate as scents usually trigger migraine for me. I had no idea that two wicks would mean a stronger scent release so I am not able to burn it very long with the two wicks. This scent is just beautiful though!
customer_reviews.author: Peace feline

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting, decent scent
customer_reviews.text: I don't know, I didn't find this scent as enjoyable as so many expressed. I was looking for a fresh, energizing scent. This was not it at all. It's not bad, but it is a bit muted. You don't really smell cilantro, but I also don't quite get a pineapple scent. It smells like a stronger version of a glade candle, to be honest. It is not a bad scent, but it is not something one expects from Yankee. It is long lasting and it does drown out kitchen cooking smells, so that's why I still gave it 2 stars .
customer_reviews.author: Valentina

customer_reviews.title: Almost no scent
customer_reviews.text: I am not even sure if this is a Yankee Candle. I am used to lighting the Yankee, and the scent filling the room within 20 minutes. This one, when I lit it, barely gave off a scent even 4 feet from the candle. Very disappointing! The candle I chose (Lavender/Lemon) is not a subtle scent by nature, so it surprised me how little scent there was. I am hoping the other Yankee I ordered, which will arrive in a few days, will be as fabulous as Yankee Candles have always been. if not, I don't think I'll be buying them online anymore. I won't buy one unless I can open the lid and sniff it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Fauxgoddess

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Yankee Candle. BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: While I love the fresh scent to this particular Yankee candle, it seems that when a candle scent gets a lot of attention, orders or good reviews, such as this one has ... suddenly the price rises. Then I won't buy it anymore. I feel like I've been played and that doesn't make me very happy.
customer_reviews.author: KandyApple

customer_reviews.title: Bad smell (don’t buy) -GREAT COMPANY!!!
customer_reviews.text: ****UPDATE**** 6/25/2020 I called Yankee Candle to express my disappointment in this candle. The CSR was a delightful woman who is replacing the horrible lemon with another fragrance at no charge. I’m upping the stars to 4 because Yankee took care of my issue without question. If this candle is “lemon” scented, Sicilian or otherwise, then I’m a road carcass. It’s horrible! It literally smells like some kind of petroleum residue. Yankee used to make a lemon scented candle, just plain lemon, and it was an amazing “cure” for cooking odors. This “Sicilian Lemon” scent makes me thankful for cooking odors. Just don’t buy this!
customer_reviews.author: LindaKTop Contributor: Calligraphy

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for $12.99
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for 12.99$ for the price it’s a great deal. Smells great and can be given as a gift. I would never pay more than $12.99 for a yankee candle. There are far superior candle brands that cost less than the retail of Yankee Candle.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: The absolute best scent Yankee has
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best scent Yankee has!! This combination of scents is amazing for so many reasons but the biggest is that it kills cigarette smoke like magic. It smells so good but it also seems to freshen a house so very well. I've used these for years and there are no better.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Not The Same
customer_reviews.text: Not happy at all. I normally buy the larger 28$ candle of the Honey Clementine but I decided to order this size. The candle itself looked different upon opening. The appearance is more of a melted crayon than the regular 'glycerin' (for lack of anything better to call it) look than I'm used too. There's practically zero scent to this candle and I feel it's a waste of 16$. Going to attempt to return for credit. Will stick with larger candle from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Ronni & Ray

customer_reviews.title: 🍯🍊Honey clementine smells AMAZING!
customer_reviews.text: SMELLS AMAZING! I haven’t even lit it yet and I could smell it outside of the packaging it came in. I’m so glad I ordered it! If you love citrus 🍊 smells buy this candle. I have a feeling I will be making repeat purchases for my “Honey Clementine”🎼🎼🎼. #inLOVEwithmycandle
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Sicillian Lemon Scented Candle Not Very Scented
customer_reviews.text: I got this candle for my home office hoping the scent would be invigorating, as I have found lemon to be. I was very excited about its arrival to the point that I stalked its delivery progress like I would have a major electronic. Alas, I am super disappointed. The candle seems to burn well, and it probably burns long. However, it is sitting right next to my computer, and I cannot smell a thing, which is odd because I can smell scents as well as a dog. So, the search for an invigorating lemon candle continues.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Black cherry - cherry popsicle/cough drop scent
customer_reviews.text: We got the Black Cherry candle. The scent is strong and can be detected even while still inside the shipping box. Yet it is also not overwhelming when placed in a good-sized room like a living room. Both my spouse and I immediately declared that it smelled like popsicles (unlit). It really, uncannily smells like the classic cherry popsicle when unlit. When lit, it starts to smell a bit more like cherry cough drops. It is a pretty good scent, though not as "cozy" as certain other candle scents, possibly because the cough-drop scent evokes less pleasant memories.
customer_reviews.author: East Coast Propsners

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I am so impressed with Amazon's prices on Yankee Candles and the delivery is within days. I am sooooooooooooo glad I stopped ordering Harry Slatkin four wicks (bad wicks drown in wax, no scent, horrible, three wicks are better). I am so happy with Amazon and Yankee, had them for years and now Amazon got me back to Yankee. Thanks Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Diggity

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Gives off little if any scent. Feeling ripped off. 😡
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dont cheap out when it comes to beautifying your living space
customer_reviews.text: Once again Yankee Candle delivers. There is a reason why, in my opinion, YC is the industry standard in candle scent / value. Just a few minutes of burn time and my Apt smells fantastic. 26.00 may be a bit much for some people to spend on a candle. I get that. This is also a 22 oz behemoth. The value for the price is ridiculous at whatever size you get. Dont cheap out when it comes to beautifying your living space. Do you really want your apt/house smelling like cheap no name candle you picked up at a convenience store? I didnt think so.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Candle has no scent
customer_reviews.text: This candle was sent lying on it's side so the wax was coming out of the lid. I then had another one sent in it's place. I lit the candle and had it burn for 30-40 minutes. No scent. Let it burn for 2 hours, no scent. I have a feeling the seller is bogus.
customer_reviews.author: Mw

customer_reviews.title: Great scent but...
customer_reviews.text: Love Yankee candles! The scent lasts long and they burn clean. This was not my first online purchase of a candle, I tried it out and found that the others arrived intact. This purchase however, arrived broken. It came in the same packaging: a box with pressed cardboard insert in the shape of the candle inside a larger box with packing plastic (air filled bags). Unfortunately the glass tumbler was broken, there were shards of glass floating around in the secondary box. The outer box was slightly damaged. It still smells awesome though. But I guess I have to go back to the brick and mortar stores for my candles.
customer_reviews.author: o

customer_reviews.title: Very little sense don’t think this is a real Yankee???
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think this is a real Yankee candle. When I buy Yankee candles and I open them up they pretty much set up the whole room before I’ve even let them. I’ve bought two of these in an orange and a lemon and neither one of them have a very strong smell.
customer_reviews.author: Julie smart

customer_reviews.title: Not usable
customer_reviews.text: The candle must have been stored in the heat. It was previously melted and dried over the wick. It did not occur on the delivery truck bc it was completely dry by the time it arrived. I’m not able to request a new one without shipping this one back which is a hassle.
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: For Small Rooms with the door Closed :(
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed. I saw the great reviews and figured this would be an amazing candle but I was ver let down. I will say, when I opened the box, I immediately smelled the lavender. However once it started to burn, I needed 2-3 hours in my bedroom with the door closed for the smell to linger. All to go away once I open another door. Pros: big and will take long to burn - the light scent it has is pleasant in small rooms - cute colors - great for gift Cons: - smell won’t last - takes too long to actually smell. - overpriced for the quality
customer_reviews.author: NinaPurr

customer_reviews.title: Very weak throw
customer_reviews.text: Smells delicious and very fruity cold, but warm it was a total failure as I had nearly no throw at all. Two points only because of the delicious scent of mango and peach, both equally smellable.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi07

customer_reviews.title: I love these candles
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles,but when they are shipped laying on their side they melt and you can not get to the wick. I put it in the sun and it melted back. but then you have to dig in the wax to find the wick
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You’re better off buying the ones in store!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of their candles because it was on sale. However, I’m starting to question whether it was even worth the price I paid. I can certainly say, these are not worth purchasing if it’s not on sale, in my opinion. Upon opening the package, it smelled wonderful. The first hour or so was probably the most scent I got. These do not have much scent whatsoever. I bought candles in honey clementine, lilac blossom, and lemon lavender. Of the three, the lilac probably gave off the most scent.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Honey Clementine Love
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite candle. I buy it every spring and always get compliments. It doesn't have to be a spring scent, but it's fresh and slightly sweet, though not too much. It doesn't smell artificial or sugary. Strong but not too strong. I never get sick of it. Will buy again and again.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great Candle - seems weaker than last time
customer_reviews.text: The candle smells great. I once ordered this in the past from someone doing a Yankee Candle Fundraiser and loved it. When I saw it on here for cheaper, I ordered it again. It still is a great candle, but it does seem a bit weaker than I remember from the previous purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dex

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: It smells really good even that I have allergy to perfumes it’s not overwhelming It absorbs the cooking smells from home making it smells very clean The shipping team did awesome job packing it . I really appreciate it I will buy it again Regards
customer_reviews.author: sara

customer_reviews.title: Grape (not wine)
customer_reviews.text: Not the smells of wine, but the smells of grapes ripening in the sun. If you like Concord grapes, grape juice, grapey smells, this is for you. Sweet like MacIntosh apple (one of my faves) but different, if you get bored with apple. A topper prevents tunneling and uneven burning:You can get seasonal ones or a generic type for any season.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna D.

customer_reviews.title: love this scent but...
customer_reviews.text: It isn't the newest label candle like in the pic. If you are a Yankee Candle fan you know what I mean. Luckily it still had good throw but then again it's Vineyard and to me it is one of the best they ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Tarjara

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I love yankee candles, and I guess each smell is subjective. But this scent is not my favorite. The smell when you first open the jar, does not match the smell when its burning.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Marshall

customer_reviews.title: No scent?
customer_reviews.text: Was really really excited to turn my room into a mango tropical paradise. When I opened the package I was excited because it smelled heavily of mango. Unfortunately, that was the strongest the candle would ever smell. When I lit and burned it, it had little to no aroma and I could only smell it when my nose was a few inches from the hot wax. I don't know if they are fake but I amextremely disappointed. This product on the other hand by the "same company"was almost too strong (but nice)! Something is fishy!
customer_reviews.author: Mel C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice smelling candle - just wish it was a little bit bigger for the price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Lemon-Lavender scent and it smells great and is quite strong! The candle came packaged well so it wasnt broken and the candle had not melted from the summer heat. My only critique is how small the candle is (the small tumbler). Considering the candle cost about $13, i would have hoped that it would have been a bit bigger. Other than that, the candle is nice!
customer_reviews.author: Adam F

customer_reviews.title: Sweet summer lemons
customer_reviews.text: We had a small lemon one, was happy to get a large one for the table as I know the color and scent will last. This was a warehouse deal and came well packaged in original yankee candle packaging. Very happy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa M

customer_reviews.title: Wierd scent
customer_reviews.text: I don't care for this scent. I smelled it in a store and really liked it. This one says it's the same scent but it doesn't smell nearly as good...or even the same scent. I love Yankee candles but I won't buy this one again.
customer_reviews.author: JazzyCarol

customer_reviews.title: So summery and fruity! Great throw, too!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing fruity scent!!! So summery! You will feel like you are on a beach at an all inclusive resort. The only disappointment? You feel like a server will come by with a cocktail. Sadly, they never show up lol.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scent!!! Relaxing with a sense of fresh spring!
customer_reviews.text: I hope the lemon and lavender scent stays on in their product line. I discovered this candle in the stores during the spring and this candle burns for hours, keeping me relaxed and focused while I am working from home or spending time alone to read a good book. I purchase two at a time on Amazon every couple of months and never regret it. I’ve gotten almost 10 of these candles so far and will continue to buy this scent.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie McCracken

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye Yankee Candles
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what happened with Yankee Candles, they were my favorite. I've bought several different ones, and the scent isn't as strong as it use to be. I cant remember when one burnt evenly. The only thing that seems to remain the same is the price. The smell is faint with this, and the strawberry lime is just the same. Really not worth writing a review on.
customer_reviews.author: Big Crab

customer_reviews.title: Not original.
customer_reviews.text: When this candle arrived, I noticed fluid leaking throughout the wax. Looked like the glass jar had been refilled with a homemade wax. The jar broke so I had to put it in a different holder to burn it. The smell is great, but when burning, leaves black soot on EVERYTHING. That is not typical of Yankee Candles I've purchased. The pictures shown are from about an hour and a half of burn. I cleaned the glass and wall and burned it again to see the difference. Sent back the others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I read all the reviews before purchasing about how great this scent smell
customer_reviews.text: I read all the reviews before purchasing about how great this scent smell, however I was very disappointed that I could barely detect the scent. The tart candles from Walmart smelled better and stronger
customer_reviews.author: Julie HUbbard

customer_reviews.title: Berrylicous delicious
customer_reviews.text: I love all scents with berries and was never disappointed. This was too, is absolutely great, but I have to add, that I could only smell the blueberries nothing of vanilla. The scent is very strong and lingers in the room for hours. Definitely one, I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi07

customer_reviews.title: Hoping my problem was only a one time thing ! 😃
customer_reviews.text: The only problem I have is that I’ve ordered yankee candies in the past (which Are the BEST) and I lLOVE Amazon buy the Macintosh candle I received today looks like it melted and reformed with weird bubbles on top and candle wax inside the lid. As usual it was packed VERY well, I’ve had other things shipped so poorly it was amazing (not from amazon) anyway I gave five stars anyway before I see how this problem will affect the candle???? It smells sooooo good!!! So I’m hoping this was just a fluke and won’t smell bad or burn too fast !!! Fingers crossed lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Robin G

customer_reviews.title: Black Cherry is one of Yankees best candles. The aroma is wonderful and it has ...
customer_reviews.text: Black Cherry is one of Yankees best candles. The aroma is wonderful and it has really good throw !! One of my favorites and I would recommend to anyone that loves having a candle burning.
customer_reviews.author: Amy O.

customer_reviews.title: Great smell
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best scents I think they sell. It does have a masking scent, so if you have pets it does help cover litter box smells and toots.
customer_reviews.author: HonestBuddha

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if this candle was old but I almost buy Yankee candle and they make my home smell amazing but this candle no one smelled anything. I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.author: amber

customer_reviews.title: Not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I buy Yankee candles all the time, and have for 40 years. This is the first time I have ever ordered candles from Amazon. I don't know if they are reject or if something just went wrong in production. This Large candle completely burned in 3 days. So the difference in price makes NO sense at all.
customer_reviews.author: DEB KAR

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic candle of the great scent!
customer_reviews.text: I always really enjoying key candles I always last a long time and have a very strong scent! I would say that the scent is definitely nice in my opinion I wish it was stronger but maybe that's because I like to be overpowered. definitely not a bad kennel whatsoever I would definitely recommend to anybody!
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells so good! It makes the whole house smells awesome! I LOVE it! Perfect Spring/Summer/Stuck-in-the-House-COVID-19 fragrance! My new favorite Yankee Candle! Will DEFINITELY buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Jo J.

customer_reviews.title: Scent lasts as long as the candle
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of vineyard. Yankee candles last a long time and the scent stays strong all the way to the bottom of the candle. The wicks always work. The only downfall is the wick does not burn clean and leaves black soot around the top of the candle but that is the only fault I can find. Sorry, have to subtract a star
customer_reviews.author: New Era Goldens

customer_reviews.title: Smells yummy!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells really nice. It’s not too overpowering of a scent and I like to burn it in my bathroom. It’s the perfect sweet and clean citrus smell for a bathroom. I already bought a second one and will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Muddy

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I was skeptical of purchasing this candle not directly at the store however I was extremely happy that I didn’t! Not only did I save money, I also saved myself the headache of fighting crowds during Christmas time. My friend absolutely loves this scent and she immediately started to burn it the moment she opened it!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth James

customer_reviews.title: Not as pretty but works!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if these are not real Yankee candles or maybe these are the rejects bc the one I got had looked like it had already been used with wax on the sides of the glass and the scent didn't seem as strong as I saw other comments for the same one. But has lasted a long time so far and I do notice the scent I love honey Clementine
customer_reviews.author: Mariel ward

customer_reviews.title: Nice size but lacks scent
customer_reviews.text: The scent is not very strong for this candle. I expected my kitchen to be full of lemon and I can barely smell it while I am standing near it. I have left it to burn for a couple hours and still do not get much scent. I like the color and will continue to burn but am thinking twice before I'd purchase a Yankee candle online again.
customer_reviews.author: BargainBecky

customer_reviews.title: Great price on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Smells and looks fabulous! I’ve never been disappointed with Yankee Candle! **i also ordered the black cherry. The purchase was because the color was what I wanted. Well, turns out that it has a fabulous scent when lit! It smells just like a bowl of fresh cherries!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Love this candle
customer_reviews.text: I got an original from the Yankee store. Lasted a whole year, and it smells great. Unfortunately it's seasonal.. glad I could get it here tho!
customer_reviews.author: 4everpunkin

customer_reviews.title: Aroma
customer_reviews.text: I have to update my review. Yankee candle associate contact me and send me a replacement. Their customer service is Very Good. (old review. This candle does not give any aroma. I bought other in the pass and was excellent. I am not happy with this one.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for smaller areas
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this candle when I used it in the bathroom to cover smells, made it smell clean. However, the scent did not carry as when I used it in the living room. I would say this is a nice subtle scent for smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Me

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: Love this scent and how long it last. I light it when I'm practicing yoga. And the price was less than the store
customer_reviews.author: Captj47

customer_reviews.title: Not a very pleasant fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Since lemon and lavender are bright, uplifting smells, I bought this to encourage myself during this coronavirus outbreak and my quarantine. But, it is neither bright nor uplifting. Its a dark-ish smell, heavy and depressing. I'm so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Milliken

customer_reviews.title: Well Packaged!
customer_reviews.text: I love these candles and these folks know how to package and ship them whereas others do not. Candle was cradled in cardboard egg crate and then in box surrounded by plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Gamache

customer_reviews.title: Lemon smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: The lemon smells wonderful! Not overpowering and the candle lasts forever. A clean yet refreshing smell with a touch of lemonhead scent. The smell will fill a large room.
customer_reviews.author: Belsy Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Yankee Candles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase. I paid $14 for these candles. If I had ordered from Yankee Candle it would have cost $36.50. I will order my Yankee Candles from Amazon from now on.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca govan

customer_reviews.title: Clean Burning
customer_reviews.text: I really like the Two-wick Tumbler candles because they burn clean. There is no left over wax on the sides of the tumbler that refuses to melt. I also like the price. Great value. The fragrances are clean and fresh.clean
customer_reviews.author: Alice

customer_reviews.title: Not A Real Yankee Candle Product
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Yankee Candles from the store for 6+ years. Although the label looks convincing on this candle, it is not the lemon lavender candle from Yankee Candle. It smells totally different and has such a terrible smell, I could not stand it. There is no trace of lemon in it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Fraga

customer_reviews.title: Happy Sister
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves this smell, she was having a hard time finding it since I believe Yankee candle may have discontinued this scent, or perhaps came out with one called, “Cherries in the Snow”. Amazon to the rescue, found the large jar candles, ordered them, they smell great, my sister is happy, The End.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Yankee candle knock off
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a used candle which had a 1 inch imperfection in the front of the wax candle. Not sure where this candle came from, but it was not in a Yankee standard large jar (flame lids did not fit) , The color of the candle was not red raspberry. But I lit it anyway! Doesn’t smell like red raspberry. Beware of ordering used/Returned candles, not worth the savings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One can barely smell the scent...
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these candles for a long time. Though it's a Yankee Candle, it does not smell like it was made by Yankee Candle. One review on here gave the advice of spending the extra 5.00 on the real deal and I agree. I have bought many of these candles on here, thinking each purchase would be different and unfortunately unless I sit with my head directly hanging down over the candle I cannot smell it.
customer_reviews.author: Nae

customer_reviews.title: Smells great...if your sniffing it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this... smelled it and lit it. It smelled wonderful but once lit we never smelled it again unless we were sniffing the candle. Not sure if this is typical as I don’t buy Yankee Candles a lot but I would not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Roy

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful strong scent. Great throw
customer_reviews.text: If you like a strong scented candle which also has a strong throw that fills the house up with watermelon fruity goodness, then you'll love this one! Especially at this price. I'm stocking up.
customer_reviews.author: JenLuvsHorror

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: Nice scent... I was worried it would be too sweet but it’s not... great especially for the discounted price. I tend to prefer the other style with the 2 or 3 wicks as they burn a little better but couldn’t pass up due to the price
customer_reviews.author: Ironsmom

customer_reviews.title: No scent
customer_reviews.text: I love yankee candles, but this candle scent is faint. Only smells when you first open lid and light. No scent after or anywhere else is room. I would not buy unless from yankee store where you could make sure scent is there. Disappointed in waiting for candle and spending the money.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: This candle has been through hell and back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this candle for my girlfriend, and she loved the smell of it and put it into her car. She claimed that during the warmer summer months it would make her car smell great- it did just that. However, she got into a car accident and forgot to take it out of the car, so this candle melted to the seat. After the candle was removed (the stain stays to this day) she brought it into our home and was actually able to light it for 12 more hours! This candle has long-lived past what we ever imagined it could. HIGHLY SUGGESTED!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: customer
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter. It has a very pleasant smell, and It was in a well protected package. I am pleased with it. I got it for half price on sale so it is worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Allen

customer_reviews.title: Love this Candle
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my room and I love the smell. It is subtle, but still there. The candle has lasted forever, I still have a little bit left and I have used it quite a bit (especially when compared to other candles). Overall, I would recommend and I would buy it again. I probably will when this one runs out!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Teater

customer_reviews.title: Scent is good but way too weak
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells great when you open up the lid, but it is so faint while it’s actually burning. I love The longevity of Yankee candles, but this one just smells so weak. I’m bummed because the scent is wonderful if it was just stronger.
customer_reviews.author: amazon frequenter

customer_reviews.title: Delightful!!
customer_reviews.text: It smells wonderful!! With a very strong but not too strong aroma. It fills the room just right. It provides me with a sense of comfort I have never known. It is everything i’ve been looking for in a candle and I couldn’t be happier. When my kids visit from Ohio they smell the candle and feel at peace. It cleanses them physically, spiritually, and mentally. I’m so happy with the product even though at birth I was not blessed with a sense of smell. I urge every candle and life lover to purchase this beautiful gift to the world from God himself.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander F.

customer_reviews.title: No Scent
customer_reviews.text: I should have listened to the reviews indicating that this candle does not have a scent. I have been buying Yankee Candles for years because of the wonderful scents. I don't think this is an authentic Yankee Candle. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Favdoggy

customer_reviews.title: The scent is only in the top layer...!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I love scented candles, but I am very disappointed in these! They smell fantastic right out of the box, but the scent is no longer evident once the candle burns once or twice. Yankee candles are supposed to be the best, but these are definitely not.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Little to no scent
customer_reviews.text: Don't know how Amazon can sell this. It has little to no scent. Lit it up, and still nothing. It was a gift to my wife and she was disappointed and she loves Yankee Candles. Either this is an old batch or fake.
customer_reviews.author: C-LoS

customer_reviews.title: Smells just like fresh Blueberrys 😊
customer_reviews.text: I buys these quite often! They are a little pricey, but you can’t find them in stores.... The Blueberry is our favorite one! They last a long time makes the whole house smell like Blueberries 😊 highly recommend this candle so worth the money ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ Buy this one!
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: STRONG AF SMELL
customer_reviews.text: I like a strong scent but this is truly over powering. I’m not sure I’ve ever had a candle give me a headache but this one did in under five minutes of lighting it. The smell is not unpleasant it’s just too much. If you have a large open space... like a barn; this is your candle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Brzowski

customer_reviews.title: Way to weak
customer_reviews.text: The scent itself is very pleasant. I smelled fresh strawberries with just a little of lemon but it was way to weak. You really have to sit next to it or burn it in a tiny room. Mayby it will change after a few burns when I hit the oil with the scent... otherwise a little dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: Sushi07

customer_reviews.title: Who doesn’t love the best candles around
customer_reviews.text: Who doesn’t love the best candles around?!? They smell so good you want to eat it! You can even just open the top w/o lighting it & STILL scents a small area!! I even bought one for myself!! (They we’re part of a Mothers Day gift for my mother-in-law, whom I call mom! We bought our home mostly because it is across the street from her!!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline a.

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The Macintosh apple has a classic, fresh scent. Not too overpowering. Yankee candles last way longer than any I’ve tried in the past. The price on amazon was more affordable than the stores.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Good

customer_reviews.title: Slow burn and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite scent! So happy I could find it on Amazon since it’s seasonally discontinued at Yankee Candle. I haven’t purchased one in a while so I forgot what a great quality these candles are. They burn slow and smell wonderful without being overpowering.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: I love Yankee Candles. So worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: My favorite fragrance! Yankee candle does not disappoint with lasting quality fragrances. I’m a loyal fan. Sometimes though my orders have come broken , but they have been good about replacements
customer_reviews.author: Jolyne Chacon

customer_reviews.title: My favorite candle for fall, winter!
customer_reviews.text: This candle really smells like the real deal freshly cut apples!! I had this candle in my living room, the scent was warm and overwhelming. I bought this candle 2 months ago and still have it!!!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Where's that lemon merengue pie?
customer_reviews.text: Delicious, lemony scent and a neat, steady flame (no 3" tall flames that cheaper candles often put out.) I'm pleased with it as I have been with every Yankee Candle I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Wieden

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, is lasting a while
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what people are expecting when they get a candle. It's not a spray, it's supposed to be subtle. If I leave the room and come back in, I IMMEDIATELY smell the candle (almost enough to make my husband hate me for buying them ahahaha). Super glad I managed to get my hands on this scent.
customer_reviews.author: Cass

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this one.
customer_reviews.text: I typically love Yankee candles, especially the fruit scented ones, but this one I cannot smell at all. It's like it's old or something? Maybe that is why it was such a good price. Amazon was gracious and refunded my money and I returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: HazelBlueJays

customer_reviews.title: Scent is undetectable
customer_reviews.text: I had this candle burning for several hours and could not pick up on the scent. This scent has always been a favorite of mine, so that was disappointing! I'm not sure if just got a dud; however, going off my experience --I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Same quality but the scent is off
customer_reviews.text: This, unfortunately, does not smell like honey or clementine. I am a fan of Yankee Candles, and most of their scents are wonderful. This one, to me, smells a little like yams or squash.
customer_reviews.author: noon for no-one

customer_reviews.title: Absolute Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Like others, my candle arrived having melted at some point. I live in Colorado, and it is springtime so I thought I'd have a good chance at receiving it intact. I was wrong. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't have the same scent as those I've purchased direct from Yankee Candle.
customer_reviews.text: It looks like it's from Yankee Candle, but I do wonder if it's a knock off. I purchased from this seller due to the much lower price and I got what I paid for. The scent if very, very faint and has to burn for hours to achieve even that. Will not purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Lezlie Smith

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Citrus Scent
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells so good, anytime I light it before guests come over they rave about the scent. It’s smells like citrus with a hint of sweetness that is very subtle and pleasant. I would 100% buy this again for spring/summer season
customer_reviews.author: Steven Nikolakis

customer_reviews.title: Check for damages
customer_reviews.text: Mine came shattered before I even opened it. Returned it and got it from Yankee candle on sale
customer_reviews.author: susan l. johnson

product_meta.title: Yankee Candle Large Jar Candle Lemon Lavender
product_meta.description:
Size:Large Jar| Style:Lemon LavenderThis Yankee Candle large jar candle is the perfect size for enjoying all your go-to fragrances. At 22 oz., the scented candle provides a long burn to add a pleasant aroma to dinner parties, lazy Saturdays, and a season's worth of little moments. Each candle from Yankee Candle is made in America with premium-grade paraffin candle wax with quality ingredients from around the world, and each wick is straightened by hand to ensure the best quality burn. 



Fragrance Notes: 

Top: Tangerine, Lemon, Aromatic Lavender 

Mid: Fruity Notes, Orange, Petitgrain, Eucalyptus 

Base: Vanilla, Hints of Spice
feature_bullets: Clean and inviting, this powdery fresh scent blends tangy lemon citrus and sweet lavender flowers
Quality paraffin grade candle wax delivers a clear, consistent burn
22 ounce scented candle measures 6.6 inches H x 4 inches D
Natural fiber candle wick delivers the best burn for each fragrance

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars9,543 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
